title: Can you f******* not spoiler the game results on the client?
body:
Seriously,
Add an option to hide spoilers.
This should be a given, considering you host the worlds on the other side of the world and the games start at 6 am+- in europe. I have absoultely no intention to watch the games now.

replies.body: I came here to make a post about the same thing. Im in NA, games started at Midnight my time,woke up to a complete spoiler along the bottom of the client. And then when I went to watch on the website, it's right on the homepage which you go through to get to the VOD page. Absolutely ridiculous oversight.
Pretty sure you can disable esports content in the client. Can't check as I'm on mobile rn.

I'm fairly certain that used to be an option, I remember having it so it didnt show. But now the only option is "disable esports notifications". Originally esports was a whole separate tab you had to click on to see. Now it is just right there on the home page who is playing in the next round of the worlds tournament.

> [{quoted}](name=Jerry SeinfeId,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=4MadA24u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-21T17:35:51.977+0000)
>
> Pretty sure you can disable esports content in the client. Can't check as I'm on mobile rn.

It disables notification popups in the upper-right corner. However, esports content is no longer confined to notifications, and has become the main focus of the client, so the setting is nearly useless.
so he's talking about the news tab then i guess? while i can understand their point i can also understand riot's tbh.
You cannot disable the tab he's talking about.
I watch the games on Youtube and the results of the Quarterfinals Day 1 were in the thumbnail when I first looked -.-
C9 wins Fanatic wins.. FNC lose first game and come back to win multiple times from huge gold loss. :)
Actually Fnatic beat c9 to a 3-0 ... masterclass from caps and FNC win worlds!
